verses.verse: וַיֵּצֵ֞א <WH3318> vai-ye-Tze came forth הַגּוֹרָ֤ל <WH1486> hag-go-Ral lot הַשֵּׁנִי֙ <WH8145> hash-she-Ni And the second לְשִׁמְע֔וֹן <WH8095> le-shim-'on, to Simeon לְמַטֵּ֥ה <WH4294> le-mat-Teh [even] for the tribe בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> ve-nei- of the children שִׁמְע֖וֹן <WH8095> shim-'on of Simeon לְמִשְׁפְּחוֹתָ֑ם <WH4940> le-mish-pe-cho-Tam; according to their families וַֽיְהִי֙ <WH1961> vay-Hi become נַֽחֲלָתָ֔ם <WH5159> na-cha-la-Tam, and their inheritance בְּת֖וֹךְ <WH8432> be-Toch was within נַחֲלַ֥ת <WH5159> na-cha-Lat the inheritance בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> be-nei- of the children יְהוּדָֽה׃ <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah. of Judah

וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> vay-Hi had לָהֶ֖ם <WH1992> la-Hem like בְּנַֽחֲלָתָ֑ם <WH5159> be-na-cha-la-Tam; And they had in their inheritance בְּאֵֽר־ be-'er- שֶׁ֥בַע <WH884> She-va' Beersheba וְשֶׁ֖בַע <WH7652> ve-She-va' or Sheba וּמוֹלָדָֽה׃ <WH4137> u-mo-la-Dah. and Moladah
וַחֲצַ֥ר va-cha-Tzar שׁוּעָ֛ל <WH2705> shu-'Al And Hazarshual וּבָלָ֖ה <WH1088> u-va-Lah and Balah וָעָֽצֶם׃ <WH6107> va-'A-tzem. and Azem
וְאֶלְתּוֹלַ֥ד <WH513> ve-'el-to-Lad And Eltolad וּבְת֖וּל <WH1329> u-ve-Tul and Bethul וְחָרְמָֽה׃ <WH2767> ve-cha-re-Mah. and Hormah
וְצִֽקְלַ֥ג <WH6860> ve-tzik-Lag And Ziklag וּבֵית־ u-veit- הַמַּרְכָּב֖וֹת <WH1024> ham-mar-ka-Vot and Bethmarcaboth וַחֲצַ֥ר va-cha-Tzar סוּסָֽה׃ <WH2701> su-Sah. and Hazarsusah

וּבֵ֥ית u-Veit לְבָא֖וֹת <WH1034> le-va-'ot And Bethlebaoth וְשָֽׁרוּחֶ֑ן <WH8287> ve-sha-ru-Chen; and Sharuhen עָרִ֥ים <WH5892> 'a-Rim cities שְׁלֹשׁ־ <WH7969> she-losh- three עֶשְׂרֵ֖ה <WH6240> 'es-Reh ten וְחַצְרֵיהֶֽן׃ <WH2691> ve-chatz-rei-Hen. and their villages

עַ֥יִן׀ <WH5871> 'A-yin Ain רִמּ֖וֹן <WH7417> rim-Mon Remmon וָעֶ֣תֶר <WH6281> va-'E-ter and Ether וְעָשָׁ֑ן <WH6228> ve-'a-Shan; and Ashan עָרִ֥ים <WH5892> 'a-Rim cities אַרְבַּ֖ע <WH702> 'ar-Ba' four וְחַצְרֵיהֶֽן׃ <WH2691> ve-chatz-rei-Hen. and their villages

וְכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol and all הַֽחֲצֵרִ֗ים <WH2691> ha-cha-tze-Rim, And all the villages אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which סְבִיבוֹת֙ <WH5439> se-vi-Vot that [were] round about הֶֽעָרִ֣ים <WH5892> he-'a-Rim these cities הָאֵ֔לֶּה <WH428> ha-'El-leh, these עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- far בַּֽעֲלַ֥ת ba-'a-Lat בְּאֵ֖ר <WH1192> be-'Er to Baalathbeer רָ֣אמַת <WH7414> Ra-mat Ramath נֶ֑גֶב <WH5045> Ne-gev; of the south זֹ֗את <WH2063> Zot, likewise נַחֲלַ֛ת <WH5159> na-cha-Lat This [is] the inheritance מַטֵּ֥ה <WH4294> mat-Teh of the tribe בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> ve-nei- of the children שִׁמְע֖וֹן <WH8095> shim-'on of Simeon לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָֽם׃ <WH4940> le-mish-pe-cho-Tam. according to their families

מֵחֶ֙בֶל֙ <WH2256> me-Che-vel Out of the portion בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei of the children יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah, of Judah נַחֲלַ֖ת <WH5159> na-cha-Lat [was] the inheritance בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei of the children שִׁמְע֑וֹן <WH8095> shim-'on; of Simeon כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for הָיָ֞ה <WH1961> ha-Yah become חֵ֤לֶק <WH2506> Che-lek for the part בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> be-nei- of the children יְהוּדָה֙ <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah of Judah רַ֣ב <WH7227> rav was too much מֵהֶ֔ם <WH1992> me-Hem, of Judah's וַיִּנְחֲל֥וּ <WH5159> vai-yin-cha-Lu the inheritance בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> ve-nei- for them therefore the children שִׁמְע֖וֹן <WH8095> shim-'on of Simeon בְּת֥וֹךְ <WH8432> be-Toch within נַחֲלָתָֽם׃ <WH5159> na-cha-la-Tam. inheritance פ Peh

וַיַּ֙עַל֙ <WH5927> vai-Ya-'al came up הַגּוֹרָ֣ל <WH1486> hag-go-Ral lot הַשְּׁלִישִׁ֔י <WH7992> hash-she-li-Shi, And the third לִבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> liv-Nei for the children זְבוּלֻ֖ן <WH2074> ze-vu-Lun of Zebulun לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָ֑ם <WH4940> le-mish-pe-cho-Tam; according to their families וַיְהִ֛י <WH1961> vay-Hi become גְּב֥וּל <WH1366> ge-Vul and the border נַחֲלָתָ֖ם <WH5159> na-cha-la-Tam of their inheritance עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- far שָׂרִֽיד׃ <WH8301> sa-Rid. was unto Sarid

וְעָלָ֨ה <WH5927> ve-'a-Lah went up גְבוּלָ֧ם׀ <WH1366> ge-vu-Lam And their border לַיָּ֛מָּה <WH3220> lai-Yam-mah toward the sea וּמַרְעֲלָ֖ה <WH4831> u-mar-'a-Lah and Maralah וּפָגַ֣ע <WH6293> u-fa-Ga' and reached בְּדַבָּ֑שֶׁת <WH1708> be-dab-Ba-shet; to Dabbasheth וּפָגַע֙ <WH6293> u-fa-Ga' and reached אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to הַנַּ֔חַל <WH5158> han-Na-chal, to the river אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> 'a-Sher after עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- that פְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> pe-Nei that [is] before יָקְנְעָֽם׃ <WH3362> ya-ke-ne-'Am. Jokneam

וְשָׁ֣ב <WH7725> ve-Shav And turned מִשָּׂרִ֗יד <WH8301> mis-sa-Rid, from Sarid קֵ֚דְמָה <WH6924> Ke-de-mah eastward מִזְרַ֣ח <WH4217> miz-Rach east side הַשֶּׁ֔מֶשׁ <WH8121> hash-She-mesh, east side עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- far גְּב֥וּל <WH1366> ge-Vul unto the border כִּסְלֹ֖ת kis-Lot תָּבֹ֑ר <WH3696> ta-Vor; of Chislothtabor וְיָצָ֥א <WH3318> ve-ya-Tza and then goeth out אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to הַדָּֽבְרַ֖ת <WH1705> had-da-ve-Rat to Daberath וְעָלָ֥ה <WH5927> ve-'a-Lah and goeth up יָפִֽיעַ׃ <WH3309> ya-Fi-a'. to Japhia

וּמִשָּׁ֤ם <WH8033> u-mish-Sham there עָבַר֙ <WH5674> 'a-Var And from thence passeth on along קֵ֣דְמָה <WH6924> Ke-de-mah eastward מִזְרָ֔חָה <WH4217> miz-Ra-chah, the sunrise גִּתָּ֥ה git-Tah חֵ֖פֶר <WH1662> Che-fer to Gittahhepher עִתָּ֣ה 'it-Tah קָצִ֑ין <WH6278> ka-Tzin; to Ittahkazin וְיָצָ֛א <WH3318> ve-ya-Tza and goeth out רִמּ֥וֹן <WH7417> rim-Mon to Remmonmethoar הַמְּתֹאָ֖ר <WH7417> ham-me-to-'Ar to Rimmon הַנֵּעָֽה׃ <WH5269> han-ne-'Ah. to Neah

וְנָסַ֤ב <WH5437> ve-na-Sav compasseth אֹתוֹ֙ <WH853> o-To הַגְּב֔וּל <WH1366> hag-ge-Vul, And the border מִצְּפ֖וֹן <WH6828> mitz-tze-Fon it on the north side חַנָּתֹ֑ן <WH2615> chan-na-Ton; to Hannathon וְהָיוּ֙ <WH1961> ve-ha-Yu become תֹּֽצְאֹתָ֔יו <WH8444> to-tze-'o-Tav, and the outgoings גֵּ֖י <WH1516> gei thereof are in the valley יִפְתַּח־ yif-tach- אֵֽל׃ <WH3317> 'El. of Jiphthahel

וְקַטָּ֤ת <WH7005> ve-kat-Tat And Kattath וְנַֽהֲלָל֙ <WH5096> ve-na-ha-Lal and Nahallal וְשִׁמְר֔וֹן <WH8110> ve-shim-Ron, and Shimron וְיִדְאֲלָ֖ה <WH3030> ve-yid-'a-Lah and Idalah וּבֵ֣ית u-Veit לָ֑חֶם <WH1035> La-chem; and Bethlehem עָרִ֥ים <WH5892> 'a-Rim cities שְׁתֵּים־ <WH8147> she-teim- both עֶשְׂרֵ֖ה <WH6240> 'es-Reh ten וְחַצְרֵיהֶֽן׃ <WH2691> ve-chatz-rei-Hen. with their villages

זֹ֛את <WH2063> zot likewise נַחֲלַ֥ת <WH5159> na-cha-Lat This [is] the inheritance בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> be-nei- of the children זְבוּלֻ֖ן <WH2074> ze-vu-Lun of Zebulun לְמִשְׁפְּחוֹתָ֑ם <WH4940> le-mish-pe-cho-Tam; according to their families הֶֽעָרִ֥ים <WH5892> he-'a-Rim these cities הָאֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> ha-'El-leh these וְחַצְרֵיהֶֽן׃ <WH2691> ve-chatz-rei-Hen. with their villages פ Peh

לְיִ֨שָּׂשכָ֔ר <WH3485> le-Yis-so-sh-Char, to Issachar יָצָ֖א <WH3318> ya-Tza came out הַגּוֹרָ֣ל <WH1486> hag-go-Ral lot הָֽרְבִיעִ֑י <WH7243> ha-re-vi-'I; [And] the fourth לִבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> liv-Nei for the children יִשָּׂשכָ֖ר <WH3485> yis-so-sh-Char of Issachar לְמִשְׁפְּחוֹתָֽם׃ <WH4940> le-mish-pe-cho-Tam. according to their families

וַיְהִ֖י <WH1961> vay-Hi become גְּבוּלָ֑ם <WH1366> ge-vu-Lam; And their border יִזְרְעֶ֥אלָה <WH3157> yiz-re-'E-lah was toward Jezreel וְהַכְּסוּלֹ֖ת <WH3694> ve-hak-ke-su-Lot and Chesulloth וְשׁוּנֵֽם׃ <WH7766> ve-shu-Nem. and Shunem
וַחֲפָרַ֥יִם <WH2663> va-cha-fa-Ra-yim And Hapharaim וְשִׁיאֹ֖ן <WH7866> ve-shi-'On and Shion וַאֲנָחֲרַֽת׃ <WH588> va-'a-na-cha-Rat. and Anaharath
וְהָֽרַבִּ֥ית <WH7245> ve-ha-rab-Bit And Rabbith וְקִשְׁי֖וֹן <WH7191> ve-kish-Yon and Kishion וָאָֽבֶץ׃ <WH77> va-'A-vetz. and Abez

וְרֶ֧מֶת <WH7432> ve-Re-met And Remeth וְעֵין־ ve-'ein- גַּנִּ֛ים <WH5873> gan-Nim and Engannim וְעֵ֥ין ve-'Ein חַדָּ֖ה <WH5876> chad-Dah and Enhaddah וּבֵ֥ית u-Veit פַּצֵּֽץ׃ <WH1048> patz-Tzetz. and Bethpazzez

וּפָגַע֩ <WH6293> u-fa-Ga' reacheth הַגְּב֨וּל <WH1366> hag-ge-Vul And the coast בְּתָב֤וֹר <WH8396> be-ta-Vor to Tabor; וְשַׁחֲצוּמָה ve-sha-cha-tzu-mah כוְשַׁחֲצִ֙ימָה֙ <WH7831> ve-sha-cha-Tzi-mah Shahazimah קוּבֵ֣ית u-Veit שֶׁ֔מֶשׁ <WH1053> She-mesh, and Bethshemesh וְהָי֛וּ <WH1961> ve-ha-Yu become תֹּצְא֥וֹת <WH8444> to-tze-'ot and the outgoings גְּבוּלָ֖ם <WH1366> ge-vu-Lam of their border הַיַּרְדֵּ֑ן <WH3383> hai-yar-Den; were at Jordan עָרִ֥ים <WH5892> 'a-Rim cities שֵׁשׁ־ <WH8337> shesh- six עֶשְׂרֵ֖ה <WH6240> 'es-Reh teen וְחַצְרֵיהֶֽן׃ <WH2691> ve-chatz-rei-Hen. with their villages

זֹ֗את <WH2063> Zot, likewise נַחֲלַ֛ת <WH5159> na-cha-Lat This [is] the inheritance מַטֵּ֥ה <WH4294> mat-Teh of the tribe בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> ve-nei- of the children יִשָּׂשכָ֖ר <WH3485> yis-so-sh-Char of Issachar לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָ֑ם <WH4940> le-mish-pe-cho-Tam; according to their families הֶעָרִ֖ים <WH5892> he-'a-Rim the cities וְחַצְרֵיהֶֽן׃ <WH2691> ve-chatz-rei-Hen. and their villages פ Peh

וַיֵּצֵא֙ <WH3318> vai-ye-Tze came out הַגּוֹרָ֣ל <WH1486> hag-go-Ral lot הַֽחֲמִישִׁ֔י <WH2549> ha-cha-mi-Shi, And the fifth לְמַטֵּ֥ה <WH4294> le-mat-Teh for the tribe בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> ve-nei- of the children אָשֵׁ֖ר <WH836> 'a-Sher of Asher לְמִשְׁפְּחוֹתָֽם׃ <WH4940> le-mish-pe-cho-Tam. according to their families

וַיְהִ֖י <WH1961> vay-Hi become גְּבוּלָ֑ם <WH1366> ge-vu-Lam; And their border חֶלְקַ֥ת <WH2520> chel-Kat was Helkath וַחֲלִ֖י <WH2482> va-cha-Li and Hali וָבֶ֥טֶן <WH991> va-Ve-ten and Beten וְאַכְשָֽׁף׃ <WH407> ve-'ach-Shaf. and Achshaph

וְאַֽלַמֶּ֥לֶךְ <WH487> ve-'a-lam-Me-lech And Alammelech וְעַמְעָ֖ד <WH6008> ve-'am-'Ad and Amad וּמִשְׁאָ֑ל <WH4861> u-mish-'Al; and Misheal וּפָגַ֤ע <WH6293> u-fa-Ga' and reacheth בְּכַרְמֶל֙ <WH3760> be-char-Mel to Carmel הַיָּ֔מָּה <WH3220> hai-Yam-mah, westward וּבְשִׁיח֖וֹר u-ve-shi-Chor לִבְנָֽת׃ <WH7884> liv-Nat. and to Shihorlibnath

וְשָׁ֨ב <WH7725> ve-Shav And turneth מִזְרַ֣ח <WH4217> miz-Rach east side הַשֶּׁמֶשׁ֮ <WH8121> hash-she-Mesh east side בֵּ֣ית beit דָּגֹן֒ <WH1016> da-Gon to Bethdagon וּפָגַ֣ע <WH6293> u-fa-Ga' and reacheth בִּ֠זְבֻלוּן <WH2074> Biz-vu-lun to Zebulun וּבְגֵ֨י <WH1516> u-ve-Gei and to the valley יִפְתַּח־ yif-tach- אֵ֥ל <WH3317> 'el of Jiphthahel צָפ֛וֹנָה <WH6828> tza-Fo-nah toward the north side בֵּ֥ית beit הָעֵ֖מֶק <WH1025> ha-'E-mek of Bethemek וּנְעִיאֵ֑ל <WH5272> u-ne-'i-'El; and Neiel וְיָצָ֥א <WH3318> ve-ya-Tza and goeth out אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to כָּב֖וּל <WH3521> ka-Vul to Cabul מִשְּׂמֹֽאל׃ <WH8040> mis-se-Mol. on the left hand

וְעֶבְרֹ֥ן <WH5683> ve-'ev-Ron And Hebron וּרְחֹ֖ב <WH7340> u-re-Cho and Rehob וְחַמּ֣וֹן <WH2540> ve-cham-Mon and Hammon וְקָנָ֑ה <WH7071> ve-ka-Nah; and Kanah עַ֖ד <WH5704> 'ad far צִיד֥וֹן <WH6721> tzi-Don Zidon רַבָּֽה׃ <WH7227> rab-Bah. [even] unto great

וְשָׁ֤ב <WH7725> ve-Shav turneth הַגְּבוּל֙ <WH1366> hag-ge-Vul And [then] the coast הָֽרָמָ֔ה <WH7414> ha-ra-Mah, to Ramah וְעַד־ <WH5704> ve-'ad- against עִ֖יר <WH5892> 'ir city מִבְצַר־ <WH4013> miv-tzar- and to the strong צֹ֑ר <WH6865> Tzor; Tyre וְשָׁ֤ב <WH7725> ve-Shav turneth הַגְּבוּל֙ <WH1366> hag-ge-Vul and the coast חֹסָ֔ה <WH2621> cho-Sah, to Hosah; וְיִהְיוּ ve-yih-yu כוְהָי֧וּ <WH1961> ve-ha-Yu become קתֹצְאֹתָ֛יו <WH8444> to-tze-'o-Tav and the outgoings הַיָּ֖מָּה <WH3220> hai-Yam-mah thereof are at the sea מֵחֶ֥בֶל <WH2256> me-Che-vel from the coast אַכְזִֽיבָה׃ <WH392> 'ach-Zi-vah. to Achzib
